PackageOracle.name: DA_HEADEND
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_HEADEND
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.54.998996000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,psid IN VARCHAR2
,bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,reverse_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,upgrade_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,channels_num IN NUMBER
,engineering_id_val IN VARCHAR2
,headend_type_cd IN NUMBER
,accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,headend_territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,psid IN VARCHAR2
,bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,reverse_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,upgrade_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,channels_num IN NUMBER
,engineering_id_val IN VARCHAR2
,headend_type_cd IN NUMBER
,accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,headend_territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,psid IN VARCHAR2
,bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,reverse_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,upgrade_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,channels_num IN NUMBER
,engineering_id_val IN VARCHAR2
,headend_type_cd IN NUMBER
,accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,headend_territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_headend;

body.name: DA_HEADEND
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_HEADEND
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.55.011523000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,psid IN VARCHAR2
,bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,reverse_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,upgrade_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,channels_num IN NUMBER
,engineering_id_val IN VARCHAR2
,headend_type_cd IN NUMBER
,accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,headend_territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_headend.add(fx), parms=' || psid || '|' || bandwidth_val || '|' || reverse_bandwidth_val || '|' || upgrade_bandwidth_val || '|' || channels_num || '|' || engineering_id_val || '|' || headend_type_cd || '|' || accounting_system_id || '|' || holding_company_id || '|' || headend_territory_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_headend a
(
a.headend_id
,a.psid
,a.bandwidth_val
,a.reverse_bandwidth_val
,a.upgrade_bandwidth_val
,a.channels_num
,a.engineering_id_val
,a.headend_type_cd
,a.accounting_system_id
,a.holding_company_id
,a.headend_territory_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_headend_id.NEXTVAL
,add.psid
,add.bandwidth_val
,add.reverse_bandwidth_val
,add.upgrade_bandwidth_val
,add.channels_num
,add.engineering_id_val
,add.headend_type_cd
,add.accounting_system_id
,add.holding_company_id
,add.headend_territory_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.headend_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_headend.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,psid IN VARCHAR2
,bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,reverse_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,upgrade_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,channels_num IN NUMBER
,engineering_id_val IN VARCHAR2
,headend_type_cd IN NUMBER
,accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,headend_territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_headend.add, parms=' || psid || '|' || bandwidth_val || '|' || reverse_bandwidth_val || '|' || upgrade_bandwidth_val || '|' || channels_num || '|' || engineering_id_val || '|' || headend_type_cd || '|' || accounting_system_id || '|' || holding_company_id || '|' || headend_territory_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_headend a
(
a.headend_id
,a.psid
,a.bandwidth_val
,a.reverse_bandwidth_val
,a.upgrade_bandwidth_val
,a.channels_num
,a.engineering_id_val
,a.headend_type_cd
,a.accounting_system_id
,a.holding_company_id
,a.headend_territory_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_headend_id.NEXTVAL
,add.psid
,add.bandwidth_val
,add.reverse_bandwidth_val
,add.upgrade_bandwidth_val
,add.channels_num
,add.engineering_id_val
,add.headend_type_cd
,add.accounting_system_id
,add.holding_company_id
,add.headend_territory_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_headend.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,psid IN VARCHAR2
,bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,reverse_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,upgrade_bandwidth_val IN VARCHAR2
,channels_num IN NUMBER
,engineering_id_val IN VARCHAR2
,headend_type_cd IN NUMBER
,accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,headend_territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_headend.add, parms=' || headend_id || '|' || psid || '|' || bandwidth_val || '|' || reverse_bandwidth_val || '|' || upgrade_bandwidth_val || '|' || channels_num || '|' || engineering_id_val || '|' || headend_type_cd || '|' || accounting_system_id || '|' || holding_company_id || '|' || headend_territory_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_headend a
(
a.headend_id
,a.psid
,a.bandwidth_val
,a.reverse_bandwidth_val
,a.upgrade_bandwidth_val
,a.channels_num
,a.engineering_id_val
,a.headend_type_cd
,a.accounting_system_id
,a.holding_company_id
,a.headend_territory_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.headend_id
,add.psid
,add.bandwidth_val
,add.reverse_bandwidth_val
,add.upgrade_bandwidth_val
,add.channels_num
,add.engineering_id_val
,add.headend_type_cd
,add.accounting_system_id
,add.holding_company_id
,add.headend_territory_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_headend.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,headend_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_headend.del, parms=' || headend_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_headend a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.headend_id = del.headend_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_headend.del');

END del;

END da_headend;
